reviews.review_msg: Dr. Becalska's other reviews scared me a little but this was easily my favorite lab experience so far because of her. She is so kind and dedicated to making sure you walk away with great lab skills and understanding of the material. Always asks for feedback, encourages questions and gives TONS of resources to help with procedures and theory.

Not sure where to start with this one. Probably the most disrespectful prof with no communication skills. Doesn't respond to emails, seriously eye rolled when asked questions which I found disrespectful so I stopped asking. The TA cared more about teaching while she was on her phone in lab. Grading is just super biased. Worst prof i ever had!!

The grading criteria is not clear at all, as even if you try to follow it fully, you still have a low chance of getting a good grade. In this lab majority of your marks are dependent upon big projects which are graded very subjectively. She is very sassy, and sometimes seems rude, but overall nice. Do not take this class if you care about gpa.

Disrespectful towards students. Very sassy and gives attitude when explaining things. Her guidelines are so off from her marking rubric its insane how she's getting away with this. Constantly on her phone and totally zoned out of the lab. Created a very uncomfortable environment, the whole class seemed scared to ask questions. Super judgmental.

Nice lady, somewhat clear instructions, however, very vicious grader on projects. Was given two assignments that I spent many hours on, confirming with her, whether the everything is correct or any feedback, corrected the feedback. However, the instructions she gave seems contradictory to the grading. would not recommend if you value GPA

Agata is the sweetest lab professor I have had, she truly cares for people and how they do. The key in the lab to do well is to ask questions, you cannot expect her and the TA to attend to your every need. Overall she is very responsive in her emails and very helpful in person you just have to put the work in!

This Lab Instructor is nothing but disrespectful to people. She gives a lot of attitude and is persistently on her phone or chatting with the TA. I would not recommend taking the lab with her. Very incompetent Instructor.
Agata is a great prof. She can be a tough grader sometimes.
